thread.section_title: A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend break
thread.title_full: Weekend break - Review of A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: SJS67
title: Weekend break
text: Immaculate hotel with well equipped comfortable rooms. Used shuttle service twice but tram took you directly to Piazza Venezia. Comfortable shoes essential for all the walking! Spa was included in our stay not sure I would have gone in twice if I had to pay but a swim and steam did ease some of the aching limbs! Highly recommend if you are content to be about 20 minutes from the city as staff are very helpful and rooms extremely comfortable.
